title: Note are not saving in custom app
body:
**Describe the bug**
Notes are not saved in the tunisie app home page but saved on other pages of that zim file.


https://github.com/kiwix/kiwix-android/assets/34593983/6bbdc7a2-26a4-4ce3-943b-1bd5d840ad36



**Expected behavior**
It should save the notes on the home page as well.

**Steps to reproduce the behavior:**
* Download tunisie app.
* open application.
* try to save notes.
* you will see the error.

**Environment**
- Version of Kiwix Android: 3.7.0
- Device: Redmi Note 9
- OS version : Android 12

**Logs**
```
W/System.err: java.io.FileNotFoundException: /storage/emulated/0/Android/data/org.kiwix.kiwixcustomcustomexample/files/Kiwix/Notes/wikipedia_fr_tunisie-app_maxi_2023-01/Portail:Tunisie/Index thématique.txt: open failed: ENOENT (No such file or directory)
W/System.err:     at libcore.io.IoBridge.open(IoBridge.java:574)
W/System.err:     at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:236)
W/System.err:     at java.io.FileOutputStream.<init>(FileOutputStream.java:186)

W/System.err:     at kotlin.io.FilesKt__FileReadWriteKt.writeText$default(FileReadWrite.kt:134)

W/System.err:     at org.kiwix.kiwixmobile.core.main.AddNoteDialog$$ExternalSyntheticLambda1.onMenuItemClick(Unknown Source:2)
W/System.err:     at androidx.appcompat.widget.Toolbar$1.onMenuItemClick(Toolbar.java:207)
W/System.err:     at androidx.appcompat.widget.ActionMenuView$MenuBuilderCallback.onMenuItemSelected(ActionMenuView.java:779)
W/System.err:     at androidx.appcompat.view.menu.MenuBuilder.dispatchMenuItemSelected(MenuBuilder.java:834)
W/System.err:     at androidx.appcompat.view.menu.MenuItemImpl.invoke(MenuItemImpl.java:158)
W/System.err:     at androidx.appcompat.view.menu.MenuBuilder.performItemAction(MenuBuilder.java:985)
W/System.err:     at androidx.appcompat.view.menu.MenuBuilder.performItemAction(MenuBuilder.java:975)
```
